subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy won the Tirreno-Adriatico race in Italy, overtaking the 40-year-old American Chris Horner in the closing individual time trial.
snippet: Vincenzo Nibali of Italy won the Tirreno-Adriatico race in Italy, overtaking the 40-year-old American Chris Horner in the closing individual time trial.
